title: [Grawood Farmstead, Town]
description: From a nearby building, smoke puffs out of a stonework chimney at regular intervals, and the scent of roasted meat is strong in the air.  A pair of chairs made from oak and woven willow branches sits on the building's porch, and a small stall has been erected in front, covered by a simple oilcloth roof.  Though the road continues northwardly, a small meandering trail leads off to the southeast.
room.location: Grawood Farmstead outside of River's Rest
